content.rendered:
Directed by Ali Abbas Zafar.

Written by Su-jin Park. Varun V. Sharma. Ali Abbas Zafar.

Cast Salman Khan(Bharat). Katrina Kaif(Kumud Raina). Sunil Grover(Vilayti Khan). Tabu(Meher). Jackie Shroff(Gautam Kumar). Sonali Kulkarni(Janki Devi). Kashmira Irani(Mehek). Aashif Sheikh(Devbhai). Disha Patani(Radha). Satish Kaushik(Naval Officer Jayram Shirodkar). Nora Fatehi(Sophia). Nivin Ramani(Kayaag Zaveri (as Niveen Ramani)) . Dhiren Ahuja(Young Amitabh Bachchan). Saif Akhtar(Technician). Gs Arora(Ravinder Kumar). Riva Arora(Young Radha). Shashank Arora(Chotte). Kiran Arya(Mehek’s Husbands Mother). Shibani Bedi(Pakistani Reporter). Sonika Bhatia(Kapoor’s Wife). Hemant Bisht(Chhote’s Friend1). Sushil Bonthiyal(Teacher 1). Anthony Borg(Priest). N. Sahil Chadda(Chhote’s Friend2). Sahil Chadda(Chotte’s friend). Meiyang Chang(Jimmy). Saurabh Chauhan(Saurabh). Ronak Cheeda(Sailor 4). Krish Chugh(Meher’s Son). Ragini Chury(Fatima). Jahnavi Dave(Chhote’s Wife). Edwin De La Renta(Mikhael (Pirate Leader)). Kapil Dev(Self (archive footage)). Sachin Dhiman(Sailor 1). Nitin Dilawari(Mattress Supplier). Aagatha Gomes Figueiroa(Pretty Hostess). Daniel Freeman(Engineer 3). Vaishali Gaur(Jyoti). Aayush Gautam(Abdul). Raj Dev Gour(Chhote’s Son). Varun Goyal(Indian Reporter). Rajiv Gupta(Gulati).BÃ¼sra Duran GÃ¼ndÃ¼z. Michael Holding(Self (archive footage)). Annalies Howard(Circus Show Girl 2). Pragyaj Jain(Tinku). Shobhit Johri(1st Officer(Navy Malta)). Brijendra Kala(Chacha). Rajesh Kamboj(Harpal Singh). 

Language Hindi.

Producers Atul Agnihotri. Winston Azzopardi. Aslam Hussain. Hetvi Karia. Alvira Khan. Bhushan Kumar. Krishan Kumar. Yogendra Mogre. Nikhil Namit. Mini Purushot. Yogiraj Shetty. Arjun Singh. Navmeet Singh. Dharam Soni.

Production AVA Films & Entertainment. AVA Films and Entertainment. Latina Pictures.
